0: RESOLUTION MANDATING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION ON THE IMPLEMENTATION OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7699, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "PORTABILITY ACT", IN RELATION TO REPUBLIC ACT NO. 9994, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "THE EXPANDED SENIOR CITIZENS ACT OF 2010", FOR THE PURPOSE OF GRANTING RETIREES/PENSIONERS UNDER THE "PORTABILITY LAW", EQUAL RIGHTS AND BENEFITS AS RETIREES UNDER OTHER LAWS
